verbs.description: big 12 apologizes to [V: osu] [ARG1: mike] [ARG1: gundy] for botched call on texas td the big 12 conference head of officials called oklahoma state football coach mike gundy for a botched touchdown call on the decisive play in the cowboys 41 - 36 loss to texas on saturday official vice president twitter osu analyst scott teifer brad edwards walt anderson american football walt anderson joe bergeron oklahoma fox stillwater alex elkins sooners texas bob burda football the oklahoman oregon director oklahoma state university stillwater stillwater oklahoma bob stoops mike gundy ut nfl mike holder mike pereira daytawion lowe
